QAPair.Question: What is (are) Hammer toe repair - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: You had surgery to repair your hammer toe . During the procedure, the surgeon made an incision (cut) in your skin to expose your toe joint and repair the toe. After surgery, you may have a wire or pin holding your toe joint together. You also may have swelling in your foot.

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Hammer toe repair - discharge ?
